{{dcl | since=c++11 |
std::error_condition make_error_condition( std::future_errc e );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs an {{lc|std::error_condition}} object from a value of type {{lc|std::future_errc}} as if by:

{{cc|std::error_condition(static_cast&lt;int&gt;(e), std::future_category())}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | e | error code number}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A value of type {{lc|std::error_condition}} that holds the error code number from {{tt|e}} associated with the error category {{c|"future"}}.
